title: TNSED Administrators
description: The EMIS monitoring app is developed by TN EMIS for the purpose of carrying out various inspections and monitoring activities by all officials of the School Education Department. Various components such as Classroom observation, Civil inspection, KGBV etc will be carried out using the app. Basic data reporting will also be available through the app for adminstrative officers.
descriptionHTML: The EMIS monitoring app is developed by TN EMIS for the purpose of carrying out various inspections and monitoring activities by all officials of the School Education Department. Various components such as Classroom observation, Civil inspection, KGBV etc will be carried out using the app. Basic data reporting will also be available through the app for adminstrative officers.
summary: Official app for use of admin of School Edu Dept for carrying out inspection.
recentChanges: Home Visit Module Changes. Bugs fixing & Performance improvements.
comments: Dear TNSED App Team, I'm writing to report an issue with the Tnsed App. When I open the app, all I see is a white background. There are no menu options or buttons visible on the screen. I have tried closing and reopening the app, as well as restarting my device, but the issue persists. I use the TNSED App regularly for my work, so this is a significant issue for me. I would appreciate it if you could look into this issue and provide a solution as soon as possible
Very bad outdated app mostly unnecessary questions for AWC screening kindly make it user-friendly,It's a punishment
Even after entering correct username and password, it's showing "incorrect password". Please fix the bug as soon as possible. Thank you
Not able to open camera option in all motorollo mobiles.
Kindly give the select all options in AWC screening it will be helpful when a single person is making entries more than thousands....
